HELP_RANK.portugues: :arrow_double_up: Gaste falcoins para subir de rank

HELP_RANK2.portugues:
-Suba de rank com `/ranks rankup` para ganhar **v√°rias recompensas** que te ajudam a ganhar falcoins
-Voc√™ pode ver os pr√≥ximos ranks com `/ranks view` e ver todos os ranks com `/ranks all`
-Confira sua balan√ßa para ver qu√£o longe voc√™ est√° do pr√≥ximo rank
-Existe tamb√©m uma leaderboard baseada em ranks, suba de rank para alcan√ßar **posi√ß√µes mais altas!**
HELP_RANK2.english:
-Rank up with `/ranks rankup` to receive **multiple rewards** that help you earn more falcoins
-You can see upcoming ranks with `/ranks view` and all ranks with `/ranks all`
-Check your balance to see how far you are from the next rank
-There is also a rank leaderboard, rank up to achieve a **higher position!**

HELP_LANGUAGE3.portugues:
-O idioma padr√£o do falbot √© :flag_br: Portugu√™s-Brasil, mas √© poss√≠vel mudar para ingl√™s usando `/language english` e de volta para portugu√™s com `/language portugues`
-Para ver o idioma atual do servidor, utilize `/language`
HELP_LANGUAGE3.english:
-Falbot's default language is :flag_br: Portuguese-Brazil, but it's possible to change to english using `/language english` and back to portuguese using `/language portugues`
-To see which language your server is currently using, use `/language`

HELP_UTILS.english: :pencil: Falbot can also be useful in your daily life

HELP_INTRODUCTION2.portugues:
**:sparkles: Seu objetivo √© subir nos ranks do jogo at√© se tornar o n√∫mero um
:partying_face: Ou s√≥ se divertir com seus amigos
:coin: Veja seus falcoins e outras informa√ß√µes a qualquer hora usando o `/balance`
:stopwatch: O comando `/cooldowns` mostra o tempo at√© certas a√ß√µes poderem serem feitas novamente
:bank: Deposite regularmente no seu banco para coletar interesse no seu dinheiro
:question: Veja as outras p√°ginas desse comando para aprender a usar uma feature espec√≠fica do Falbot
:100: N√≥s cobrimos o b√°sico, mas o Falbot oferece muito mais
:fire: Continue jogando e experimentando, mas mais importante, se divirta!**
HELP_INTRODUCTION2.english:
**:sparkles: Your goal is to climb the ranks of the game to become number one
:partying_face: Or just have fun with your friends
:coin: See your falcoins and other information at any time using '/balance'
:stopwatch: The '/cooldowns' command shows the time until certain actions can be done again
:bank: Deposit regularly in your bank to collect interest in your money
:question: See the other pages of this command to learn how to use a specific feature of Falbot
:100: We've covered the basics, but Falbot offers much more
:fire: Keep playing and experimenting, but more importantly, have fun!**

FALBOT_WELCOME.portugues: :wave: Bem-vindo ao falbot! Use o menu para escolher uma p√°gina de ajuda
FALBOT_WELCOME.english: :wave: Welcome to falbot! Use the menu to pick a help page

HELP_ECONOMY3.portugues:
**:ballot_box: Vote a cada 12 horas para ganhar um b√¥nus de falcoins com `/vote`
:bank: Coloque seu dinheiro no banco e veja ele aumentar com `/bank`**
**:stopwatch: Veja quanto tempo at√© poder executar a√ß√µes de novo com `/cooldowns`**
**:busts_in_silhouette: Interaja com outros usu√°rios**
-Compita com seus amigos com `/horseduel`, `/tictactoe`, `/russianroulette` e `/fight`
-Se sentindo generoso? Doe dinheiro com `/donation`
**:game_die: Se sentindo sortudo? Aposte seus falcoins com `/slot`, `/roulette`, `/horse`, `/snakeeyes` e `/crash`**
HELP_ECONOMY3.english:
**:ballot_box: Vote every 12 hours to earn falcoins with `/vote`
:bank: Deposit your money in the bank and watch as it increases with `/bank`**
**:stopwatch: See how long until actions can be performed again with `/cooldowns`**
**:busts_in_silhouette: Interact with another users**
-Compete with your friends with `/horseduel`, `/tictactoe`, `/russianroulette` and `/fight`
-Feeling generous? Donate money with `/donation`
**:game_die: Feeling lucky? Bet your falcoins with `/slot`, `/roulette`, `/horse`, `/snakeeyes` and `/crash`**
